thig5.7:1.4: could also be 'the path [padaṁ] to Nibbāna [nibbānaṁ], that which never dies [accutaṁ]'
thig5.7:2.1: Yes! Yes! Abandon your children for the sake of Dhamma! Yes! Approved!
thig5.7:2.3: Bhante Sujāto is correct here - "chedāpayitvāna" is causative (she caused another person to cut off her hair, rather than cutting it off by herself)
